mapper.update: { CALL #{RESULT, mode=OUT, jdbcType=TABLE} := CALL vk.dgfx_buchungsablauf_f_pa.ng_suche( p_aushang_beginn => #{P_AUSHANG_BEGINN, mode=IN, jdbcType=DATE} , p_aushang_dauer => #{P_AUSHANG_DAUER, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_medium_laenge => #{P_MEDIUM_LAENGE, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_vkoe_oid => #{P_VKOE_OID, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_brc_id_l => #{P_BRC_ID_L, mode=IN, jdbcType=ARRAY, typeHandler=com.apgsga.forms2java.persistence.mybatis.NumberLTypeHandler} , p_rk_ausnahme_subj_oid => #{P_RK_AUSNAHME_SUBJ_OID, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_nk_id => #{P_NK_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_pf_id_l => #{P_PF_ID_L, mode=IN, jdbcType=ARRAY, typeHandler=com.apgsga.forms2java.persistence.mybatis.NumberLTypeHandler} , p_ein_gbot_oid_l => #{P_EIN_GBOT_OID_L, mode=IN, jdbcType=ARRAY, typeHandler=com.apgsga.forms2java.persistence.mybatis.NumberLTypeHandler} , p_aus_gbot_oid_l => #{P_AUS_GBOT_OID_L, mode=IN, jdbcType=ARRAY, typeHandler=com.apgsga.forms2java.persistence.mybatis.NumberLTypeHandler} , p_obj_oid_l => #{P_OBJ_OID_L, mode=IN, jdbcType=ARRAY, typeHandler=com.apgsga.forms2java.persistence.mybatis.NumberLTypeHandler} ) }
